author: vhennebert
msg: Hacked support for changing IPD in block-container. Only normally positioned block-containers with automatic height have been tested.

author: lektran
msg: Work around a PayPal restriction whereby you can have only one outstanding authorization against an order at a time.
Changed processCaptureSplitPayment to not actually request a new auth against paypal payments but instead just copy
the existing auth into the new paymentpref with the remaining amount.

author: srowen
msg: Performance optimizations -- use Fast data structures and rehash to flush garbage before use

author: vhennebert
msg: Bugfix: make sure all of the children elements are re-laid out after an IPD change
Removed cast into BlockLM now that the special getNextKnuthElements has been defined in LayoutManager
